entry.title: octopress tutorial
entry.content:
http://webdesign.tutsplus.com/tutorials/getting-started-with-octopressâ€“webdesign-11442 http://asaf.github.io/blog/2013/07/08/blogging-with-octopress-add-comments/ https://github.com/stchangg/mathy http://blog.zhengdong.me/2012/12/19/latex-math-in-octopress

bash $ rake install['theme'] # $ rake new_post["title"] $ rake new_page["about me"] $ rake generate # the result will be in public $ rake watch $ rake preview # this will watch as well $ rake push
